We're getting married!

Our Story

Elise and Ryan met in their Freshman year of college at SUNY Cortland. On the first day, during dorm orientation Elise and Ryan were standing next to eachother. Ryan was quietly cracking jokes which Elise shockingly found humorous enough to turn around and give Ryan a smile.

2003
2015

We're getting married on Saturday June 18th, 2016.

The ceremony and reception will be held at Obrien's Sleepy Hollow in East Aurora, NY.

Accomodations

We've set aside a block of rooms at The Hampton Inn in East Aurora . For a discounted room, mention that you're in town for our wedding.

For those looking for an alternative to The Hampton Inn, The Roycroft Inn in East Aurora is a National Historic Landmark and just down the street.

Here we are!
